documentation.text:
@title The UsingWitnet contract
 @notice Contract writers can inherit this contract in order to create Witnet data requests.

@notice Include an address to specify the WitnetRequestBoard.
 @param _wrb WitnetRequestBoard address.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Witnet request is not yet resolved by the Witnet network"

arguments.value: Witnet request is not yet resolved by the Witnet network

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Witnet request is not yet resolved by the Witnet network"

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure returns (struct Witnet.Result memory)
